page.title: 11CYRIL J. DEAL OF KELVEDON
page.content: Deal's garage opened in 1919 in those days they only sold motorbikes. Nowadays they only sell cars.Deal's garage was built next to the station so that the people going to London by train could leave their cars to be serviced and they can collect them when they get back.Deal's garage has a little camera outside which they use at night to keep guard on the cars. Cars that are left outside have a special wax put on them so the cars don't go rusty.Before you take your car on the road you must have a tax disc. Deal's garage sells diesel and petrol. Round the back of the garage they have a machine so that when you start your engine it will tell what is wrong with your car.
